statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (4,-6) and (6,14).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{14}-{\left(-{6}\right)}}}{{{6}-{\left({4}\right)}}}=\frac{{20}}{{2}} which reduces to \displaystyle{10} (if it's not already reduced)
